titleStmt.title: Turners dish of Lentten stuffe, or, A galymaufery to the tune of Watton townes end.
titleStmt.author: Turner, W.

notesStmt.note: Title of second part at head of p. [2]: The second part, or, You are welcome my guest to your Lentten fare if you come when Lent is gone, you shall haue better cheere, to the same tune.
Signed on p. [2] at bottom: W. Turner.
Imprint faded; name of publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Colophon at bottom of p. [1]: Imprinted at London for I.W.
Imperfect: faded with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
